item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Come and enjoy the summer OUTDOORS in our SPACIOUS, NICELY LANDSCAPE PATIO, that can accommodate over 500 beautiful women.

OUTDOOR POOL TABLES, BEER PONG, DARTS, BARBECUE and DANCING
till 1:30 AM underneath the STARS.

A great place to meet some very nice women.

GREAT DJ that will be mixing her R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

The LOUNGE is also open if you decide to go inside for A/C.


• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Premium Liquor
• BARBECUE
• OUT DOOR POOL TABLES
• BEER PONG
• DARTS
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 7:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: Every Saturday is Ladies Night
